document_data.name: Fish Oil
document_data.mainbody:
'''Fish oil''' was the natural [[oil]]s extracted from the bodies of various fatty fish. It was used in alchemy, ship-building, tool crafting, and as a [[spell]] [[Material component|component]].
{{quote|''We deal with magical crises, threats to the very existence of the Realms, wild creeping horrors that seek to devour all Waterdeepâ€”that sort of thing. We do not fetch down [[cat]]s from balconies where they've fled because their owners wanted to bathe them in fish oil. Fish oil is best used for romancing mermaids.''|[[Maerlus]] the Magnificent}}
document_data.Description: Fish oil was a clear yellow, greasy, pungent, liquid oil.
document_data.Availability: One noteworthy producer of these oils was [[Tethyr]]. The [[Guild of Fishmongers and Fishermen]] had warehouses on the eastern docks of [[Tulmene]] that were filled with fish oil and could be smelled from afar. The town of [[Port Kir]], like many other port cities in Tethyr, produced fresh and [[salted fish|salted]] [[fish]], as well as fish oil.
